com.google.appinventor.client.utils
Class Downloader

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Frame
              com.google.appinventor.client.utils.Downloader
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasLoadHandlers, HasAttachHandlers, HasHandlers, EventListener, IsWidget
public class Downloader
extends Frame

Utility class to download files from the server.

Implementation note (by herbertc): I would have loved to give this action a callback parameter, but it is impossible to detect a successful download. After a browser saves the downloaded file, it will not generate any further events.
